ADD_JUMP.description: UI-button: Add hyper jump to list of planned jumps

ANISOTROPIC_FILTERING_DESC.message: Gabhaidh seo sampallan o inneach air iomadh leibheil mip ach am faigh thu inneach mòran nas soilleire nuair a choimheadas tu orra air ceàrnan staoine. Cha bhi uiread a sgleò air na h-innich an uairsin ach tha an t-àireamhachadh glè chosgail.

ARRIVAL_DATE.description: Time of arrival, used in flight log

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING.description: Used in ShipInfo view, followed by a yes/no depending on if the ship can carry atmospheric shields

ATMO_PRESS_LIMIT.description: Base external pressure limit of a ship (without atmo shield)

ATTEMPTING_TO_RECOVER_GAME_PROGRESS_FROM.message: Attempting to recover game progress from save: {save}

AUTO_ROUTE.description: Automatically find shortest jump route (measured in time) in star map

CANNOT_SELL_ITEM.message: Chan urrainn dhut an nì seo a reic

CANT_FIND_PATH.description: Message when restoring savegame, file path

CANT_FIND_PLAYERS_SHIP_IN_SPACE.message: Can't find player's ship in space

CAPACITY.description: Capacity of ship to fit more equipment

CARGO_CAPACITY.description: Label to show a ship's total cargo space.

CLEAR.description: Clear an option in game settings/options menu

CLEAR_ROUTE.description: Clear a planned route of hyperjumps

COMBAT.description: Headline for kills and combat rating

COMMODITY_TRADE_ANALYSIS.message: Sgrùdadh air malart bhatharan ann an:

CONTRACT_FRAUD.description: Crime committed by intentionally breaking a contract

COULD_NOT_FIND_SYSTEM_BODY_FOR_FRAME.message: Could not find system body for frame

COULD_NOT_LOAD_GAME.message: Cha b’ urrainn dhuinn an geama a luchdadh:

CREW.description: Tab item in the start game menu

CRIMINAL_RECORD.description: Past crimes / crime history of character

CURRENT_SHIP.description: For tooltip comparing current ship specs to one in the shipyard

DATE.description: Date of an event, used in flight log

DELETE_SAVE_CONFIRMATION.message: Are you sure you want to delete this save?

DELTA_V_MAX.description: Delta-v capacity of a ship with cargo bay fully loaded with propellant

DEMAND.description: Column label for commodity demand at a market.

DEPARTURE_DATE.description: Time of departure, used in flight log

DESCRIPTION.description: Start game parameter, e.g. 'This is an easy start from Cydonia'

DETAIL_DESC.message: Bidh roghainn nas ìsle nas luaithe ach chan ann cho eireachdail

DISABLE_SCREENSHOT_INFO_DESC.message: Falaich gach fiosrachadh a tha ’ga shealltainn, a’ gabhail a-staigh co-chomharran nan siostaman, nuair a bhios glacadh-sgrìn ’ga thogail (toglaich modh an t-seallaidh fiosrachaidh).

DISPLAY_NAV_TUNNELS_DESC.message: Seallaidh seo tunail biortail gun amas a thagh thu air an t-sealladh fiosrachaidh

DISPLAY_SPEED_LINES.description: Settings option: effect when travelling in space

DISPLAY_SPEED_LINES_DESC.message: Cuiridh seo taic ris a’ mhothachadh air comhair a’ ghluasaid san fhànas

DOCKED_TO_A_BODY_THAT_IS_NOT_A_STATION.message: Docked to a body that is not a station

EDIT.description: Tooltip, to edit a flight log entry

ENABLE_COCKPIT_DESC.message: Seall modail 3D de cockpit a’ phaidhleit. (Chan eil an deas-bhòrd ach ’na ghlèidheadair-àite aig an àm seo)

ENTRY.description: A note/entry/record into the flight log

ERROR_LANDING_GEAR_DOWN.message: Cha ghabh leum os-fhànais a thòiseachadh; cha deach an uidheamachd landaidh a chur suas!

FINAL_TARGET.description: Hyperjump planner, referring to star system target

FINANCE.description: Financial statement of player, e.g. cash

FLIGHTLOG_DOCKING.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is a station name

FLIGHTLOG_FLYING.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is the name of a space body

FLIGHTLOG_HYPERSPACE.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is the star system targeted for hyperspace jump.

FLIGHTLOG_JUMPING.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is the star system targeted for hyperspace jump.

FLIGHTLOG_LANDED.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position, 'primary_info' is the name of a space body, typically a planet, the other two variables are latitude and longitude as floating point number, e.g. 'Landed on Trantor, position (-43.23, 67.89)'

FLIGHTLOG_STARPORT_ORBITAL.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is a station name, 'secondary_info' is a space body (planet, moon/satelite, star) name

FLIGHTLOG_STARPORT_SURFACE.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is a station name, 'secondary_info' is a space body (planet, moon/satelite, star) name

FLIGHTLOG_UNDOCKING.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is a station name

FLIGHT_LOG.description: Title for flight log screen, in info view

FREE.description: Used in Ship Information view as in Capacity: 10t (5t free)

GPU_JOBS_DESC.message: Cleachd an GPU airson cuid a ghnìomhan le beagan buannachd air an dèanadas, ’s docha.

HUD_2D_RADAR.description: Popup text: the name of the azimuthal equidistant projection radar

HUD_3D_RADAR.description: Popup text: the name of the planar projection radar (traditional frontier-style)

HUD_BUTTON_AUTOPILOT_FLYING_TO_TARGET.message: Tha am fèin-stiùireadh a’ sgiathadh dhan amas

HUD_BUTTON_FIX_PROGRADE.message: Ceartaich ceum air adhart na comhair

HUD_BUTTON_FIX_RETROGRADE.message: Ceartaich ceum air ais na comhair

HUD_BUTTON_LANDING_GEAR_IS_MOVING.message: Tha an uidheamachd landaidh a’ gluasad

HUD_DISTANCE_TO_SURFACE_OF_TARGET.description: Tooltip: Distance to the surface of the target.
HUD_DISTANCE_TO_SURFACE_OF_TARGET.message: An t-astar gu uachdar an amais

HUD_DURATION_OF_MANEUVER_BURN.description: Tooltip: The approximate duration of the maneuver burn with main thrusters.
HUD_DURATION_OF_MANEUVER_BURN.message: An ùine thuaireamach a bheir an losgadh-obrachaidh leis na prìomh-phutairean

HUD_DURATION_UNTIL_MANEUVER_BURN.message: An ùine gu meadhan an losgaidh-obrachaidh

HUD_FOLLOW_ORIENTATION_NOT_AVAILABLE.description: Tooltip for follow mode 'orientation' button, when it's not available for the current object.

HUD_FOLLOW_ORIENTATION_NOT_AVAILABLE_TOO.description: Tooltip for follow mode 'orientation' button, when it's not available for the current object, because it's too far.

HUD_FOLLOW_POSITION_NOT_AVAILABLE_TOO_FA.description: Tooltip for follow mode 'position' button, when it's not available for the current object, because it's too far.

PAINTSHOP_WELCOME_0.message: Welcome! We will paint your ship pretty!

PAINTSHOP_WELCOME_1.message: Hi there! Looking for a change in aesthetics?

PAINTSHOP_WELCOME_2.message: We can't make your ship fly fast, but we can make it fly in style!

PAINTSHOP_WELCOME_3.message: Welcome, traveller. Please take your time and let out your creativity.

PAINTSHOP_WELCOME_4.message: Looking the best in the galaxy has never been easier!

PLEASE_REPORT_THIS_ERROR.description: Informational text mentioning the error and asking the player to report it.
PLEASE_REPORT_THIS_ERROR.message:
Iochd, chaidh rudeigin ceàrr an-seo! Dèan aithris air na ceuman gus a’ mhearachd seo adhbharachadh, loga an às-chuir agus faidhle an t-sàbhalaidh agad gu tracaiche nam bugaichean Pioneer air Github.
Gheibh thu grèim air loga an às-chuir aig: {path}/output.txt

POSITION.description: The job title/position of crew memeber

PRESS_A_KEY_OR_CONTROLLER_BUTTON.message: Brùth air iuchair no putan uidheim-smachd no air escape airson fhalamhachadh

QUIT_CONFIRMATION.description: For the checkbox in settings window

REALISTIC_SCATTERING_DESC.message: Select scattering when rendering atmospheres. (Rayleigh/Mie is not recommended for low-end PCs)

ROTATE_VIEW.message: Cùm sìos a chuairteachadh an t-seallaidh

SIMULATING_UNIVERSE_EVOLUTION_N_BYEARS.message: A’ cruthachadh gnè an domhain: {age} billean bliadhna ;-)

STANDARD_GAME_START_TIME.description: Standard game start time, current moment + 1200 years

START_AT_BARNARDS_STAR_DESC.message: Seo toiseach doirbh o stèisean prìosain aig riaghaltas siostam Resting.

START_AT_MARS_DESC.message: Seo toiseach furasta o Cydonia air a’ Chorg ann an siostam Sol.

START_AT_NEW_HOPE.description: New Hope is an in game location

START_AT_NEW_HOPE_DESC.message: Seo toiseach le duilgheas meadhanach o Itzalean air Dòchas Ùr ann an siostam Epsilon.

START_LOG_ENTRY_1.description: First custom log message when starting a new game, giving backstory to the character. Importantly we here hint at what actions the player is best to take: buy fuel, get reputation, ask for take off clearance.
START_LOG_ENTRY_1.message: Gu mì-fhortanach, cha do sheall bràthair mo mhàthair nach maireann domh a-riamh mar a tha an seann soitheach seo ag obair ach saoilidh mu gu bheil mi a’ cur ri loga an t-soithich an-dràsta. Tha e neònach gu bheil mi a’ fhaireachdainn a làthaireachd fhathast mar an robh e am broinn ballachan an t-soithich seo. ’S dòcha gun déid e ’na co-phaidhleat domh ach an lorg sinn ar dàn san fhànas mhòr. Ach feumaidh mi haidridean a cheannach dhan draibh leuma an toiseach, cùrsa a threòrachadh gu cothroman malairt tarbhach agus ùrnaigh dha na speuran gun leig an sgioba stiùiridh trafaige leam fhàgail a dh’aindeoin cion eòlais. Chì sinn dè na comasan a th’ air an t-soitheach seo an uairsin. Gun coisinninn cliù!

START_LOG_ENTRY_2.description: First custom log message when starting a new game, giving backstory to the character, here going for a Blade Runner feeling
START_LOG_ENTRY_2.message: Tha na bòtannan agam fhathast fliuch on dìle bàthte ’nam bhaile a-raoir. Bha an làr cho fliuch gun do lìon e - mar an robh e ri dìoghaltas - speur na h-oidhche le faileas nan sanasan nìtheon os cionn na sràide fluich. Gidheadh, fhuair mi seachad air an uisge is ràinig mi an t-iteal dhan reul-port far an robh an soitheach ùr agam a’ feitheamh orm. Thug oifigear an reul-phuirt sùil gheur orm nuair a dh’innis mi dha gun robh mi airson soitheach a thogail. Cha chreid mi gu bheil coltas an speuradair cheirt orm is mi air a h-uile càil a bh’ agam airson an seann soitheach meirgeach seo a cheannach agus bòtannan fliuch orm. Co-dhiù, tha mi làn-chinnteach gur e na reultan a tha san dàn dhomh. Nise, càit a bheil an iuchair-thòiseachaidh?

START_LOG_ENTRY_3.description: First custom log message when starting a new game, giving backstory to the character. Here explaining why there's no hyperdrive in the ship, and what to do about it.
START_LOG_ENTRY_3.message: Às dèidh tuilleadh ’s a chòrr oifigealachd fhulang, nuair mi an soitheach agam air ais on ath-ghabhail mu dheireadh thall. Gidheadh, cha do dh’fhàg iad dhomh ach an t-slige, a’ tairgsinn gun robh “fiachan” agam orra. Chan ann a-mhàin gun do thog iad an t-inneal-cofaidh a b’ fheàrr leam ach tog na slaightearan sin an draibh os-fhànais cuideachd agus tha mi stuicte san t-siosta seo a-nis gus an reic mi na tha air fhàgail san t-soitheach airson draibh ùr a mhaoineachadh. Ach mar a thuirt am bodach eile: cha robh latha gun dà latha agus thèid an latha leam fhathast. A dh’aindeoin dìth a’ chofaidh. Gabhaidh mi gach cothrom is ruigidh mi na reultan fhathast.

STATION.description: Flight log info, will refer to a station by name

STATION_DOCKS.description: Information shown in the station lobby, for total number of docking pads

STATION_LOCAL_GRAVITY_PRESSURE.message: Is %.2f g an iom-tharraing agus %.2f atm am brùthadh-àile ionadail.

STATION_ORBIT.description: Information shown in the station loby
STATION_ORBIT.message: Tha sinn a’ reul-chuairteachadh {parent_body} gach {orbit_period} là(ithean).

STATION_TECH_TOO_LOW.message: Chan fhoghainn teicneolas an stèisean seo gus an nì a reic

SUMMARY.description: Tab item in the start game menu

SYSTEM_BODY_INDEX_IS_OUT_OF_RANGE.message: System body index is out of range

TECH_CERTIFIED.description: Lobby screen shows the tech level (an integer number) of the station
TECH_CERTIFIED.message: Tha teisteanas teicneolais ìre {tech_level} aig an stèisean seo.

TECH_CERTIFIED_MILITARY.description: Lobby screen shows the tech level of the station
TECH_CERTIFIED_MILITARY.message: Tha cead airson teicneolas-airm aig an ionad seo.

TECH_LEVEL.description: System view label for technology level

TEXTURE_COMPRESSION.message: Saoraidh seo barrachd chuimhne dhan chairt-ghrafaigeachd is tha sinn an dùil gur e seo am modh nas fheàrr dhut ged a bheir e barrachd ùine an geama a thòiseachadh on a thèid nithean a dhùmhlachadh.

THANKS_AND_REMEMBER_TO_BUY_FUEL.message: Mòran taing airson ur ceannach. Na dìochnaichibh uidheamachd a shuidheachadh agus connadh a cheannach mus fhalbh sibh.

THERE_IS_NOBODY_ELSE_ON_BOARD_ABLE_TO_FL.message: Chan eil duine sam bith eile air bòrd air a bhiodh comas gus an soitheach seo a stiùireadh.

THE_SHIP_IS_UNDER_STATION_CONTROL_COMMAN.message: Tha an soitheach fo smachd an stèisein, a Chomandair.

THIS_IS_FACTION_POLICE.description: Greeting message in police station. 'faction' is one of (English, non-translatable) strings: 'Solar Federation', 'Commonwealth of Independent Worlds', or 'Haber Corporation', and 'faction_police' is one of: 'SolFed Police Force', 'Confederal Police' or, 'Haber Enforcement Division'

THREE_KPC_ARM.description: Arm of the Milky Way galaxy

TOGGLE_CARGO_WINDOW.description: Label for a button toggling the cargo display window.

TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_SHOW_MOONS.description: toggle whether the overview window shows moons or not
TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_SHOW_MOONS.message: Toglaich an nochd gealaichean air an foir-shealladh gus nach nochd

TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_SHOW_STATIONS.description: toggle whether the overview window shows stations or not
TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_SHOW_STATIONS.message: Toglaich an nochd stèiseanan air an foir-shealladh gus nach nochd

TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_SORT_BY_PLAYER_DISTANCE.description: toggle whether the overview window sorts by distance from the player or from the system center
TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_SORT_BY_PLAYER_DISTANCE.message: Geàrr leum eadar seòrsachadh a-rèir astar on chluicheadair is astar o mheadhan an t-siostaim

TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_WINDOW.description: show/hide the overview window / navigation window

TOO_SMALL_FOR_CURRENT_CREW.message: Tha an soitheach ro bheag airson an sgioba agad.

TOO_SMALL_TO_TRANSSHIP.message: Chan eil rùm aig soithichean ùra airson a’ charago ’s draibh os-fhànais seo.

TOTAL_DISTANCE.description: Total distance of a (possibly series) of hyper jump(s)

TOTAL_DURATION.description: Total duration of a (possibly series) of hyper jump(s)

TRADING_AT.description: Indicates the current system for inspecting commodities.

TRADING_FROM.description: Indicates the source system of a commodity trade.

TRADING_TO.description: Indicates the destination system of a commodity trade.

UNKNOWN_FACTION.description: For entry in the flight log

UNKNOWN_LOCATION_IN_SECTOR_X.description: For entry in the flight log

UNSUCCESSFULLY_RECOVERED_PARAMETERS_ARE_.message: Unsuccessfully recovered parameters are now unlocked, please set them manually.

VIDEO_RESOLUTION_DESC.message: Seallaidh dùmhlachd-bhreacaidh nas àirde barrachd fiosrachaidh air meud nas lugha is dh’fhaoidte gum bi nithean nas slaodaiche.

VSYNC.description: For the checkbox in settings window

VSYNC_DESC.message: Dh’fhaoidte gun càraich an sioncronachadh inghearach reubadh no fuighill lèirsinneach agus dàil ion-chuir.

WAGE.description: Salary of crew shown in crew roster

WE_ARE_IN_HYPERSPACE_COMMANDER.message: Tha sinn san os-fhànais, a Chomandair.

WE_HAVE_NO_BUSINESS_WITH_YOU.description: Said by the police to law abiding player
WE_HAVE_NO_BUSINESS_WITH_YOU.message: Chan eil gnothach againn ribh aig an àm seo.

X_CANNOT_BE_TOLERATED_HERE.description: Message to be sent over comms by police when crime is committed by player
X_CANNOT_BE_TOLERATED_HERE.message: Chan fhulaing sinn {crime} ann a sheo!

YOURE_GOING_TO_REGRET_SACKING_ME.message: Bidh sibh duilich gun dug sibh a’ bhròg dhomh!

YOUR_HULL_IS_AT_X_INTEGRITY.message: Tha {value}% a dh’iomlanachd aig an t-slige agad.

YOU_DONT_HAVE_ENOUGH_MONEY_FOR_THAT_OPTI.message: Chan eil airgead gu leòr agad airson na roghainn seo.

YOU_HAVE_X_UNITS_IN_YOUR_CARGOHOLD.message: Tha {units} aonad(an) san roinn carago agad

YOU_MUST_FIRST_SELECT_A_COMBAT_TARGET_CO.message: Feumaidh sibh targaid còmhraige a thaghadh an toiseach, a Chomandair.

YOU_MUST_FIRST_SELECT_A_SUITABLE_NAVIGAT.message: Feumaidh sibh targaid seòladaireachd a thaghadh an toiseach, a Chomandair.

YOU_MUST_LAUNCH_FIRST_COMMANDER.message: Feumaidh sibh itealadh an toiseach, a Chomandair.

YOU_MUST_REQUEST_LAUNCH_CLEARANCE_FIRST_.message: Feumaidh sibh cead itealaidh iarraidh an toiseachd, a Chomandair.

YOU_NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY.message: Chan eil airgead gu leòr agad

ZOOM.description: Label for a zoom (magnification) control bar.
